alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 24 at 6:11AM AKDT until March 27 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 75 mph. Very low visibility expected. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From late tonight through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts could form. Building and power lines could be damaged. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow is expected to develop early Saturday and continue through Sunday night. Strong winds on Saturday and Saturday night could cause blizzard conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
